resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104339</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pitch: Sharp, Flat, and Natural Notes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Taktabstand: Scharfe, flache und natürliche
Anmerkungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lancement : Notes pointues, plates, et 
normales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Passo: Notas afiadas, lisas, e naturais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Passo: Note taglienti, piane e naturali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πίσσα: Αιχμηρές, επίπεδες, και φυσικές 
σημειώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Echada: Notas sostenidas, planas, y 
naturales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In standard notation, a sharp symbol raises the pitch of the natural note by a half-step; a flat symbol lowers it by a half-step.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In der Standarddarstellung hebt ein scharfes 
Symbol den Taktabstand der natürlichen Anmerkung durch einen 
Hälfte-Jobstep an; ein flaches Symbol senkt es durch einen 
Hälfte-Jobstep.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans la notation standard, un symbole pointu 
soulève le lancement de la note normale par une moitié-étape ; 
un symbole plat l'abaisse par une moitié-étape.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na notação padrão, um símbolo afiado levanta o
passo da nota natural por uma metade-etapa; um símbolo liso 
abaixa-o por uma metade-etapa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In notazione standard, un simbolo tagliente 
solleva il passo della nota naturale di un metà-punto; un 
simbolo piano lo abbassa da un metà-punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στην πρότυπη σημείωση, ένα αιχμηρό σύμβολο αυξάνει 
την πίσσα της φυσικής σημείωσης από ένα μισό-βήμα  ένα 
επίπεδο σύμβολο τον χαμηλώνει από ένα μισό-βήμα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En la notación estándar, un símbolo sostenido 
levanta la echada de la nota natural por un mitad-paso de progresio'n;
un símbolo plano lo baja por un mitad-paso de progresio'n.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
FN:CATHERINE SCHMIDT-JONES
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770209114</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution 1.0</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104339</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/pitch-sharp-flat-and-natural-notes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
